TestInformation.Title: SVT-AV1
TestInformation.Description: This is a test of the Intel Open Visual Cloud Scalable Video Technology SVT-AV1 CPU-based multi-threaded video encoder for the AV1 video format with a sample 1080p YUV video file. This test profile fork builds the encoder from Git source rather than a snapshot.
TestInformation.SubTitle: 1080p 8-bit YUV To AV1 Video Encode
